heading: HR01843
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE LATEST REPORT FROM THE PHILIPPINE STATISTICS AUTHORITY SHOWING THAT 145,000 MORE FILIPINOS ARE UNEMPLOYED IN 2017 WITH AN END GOAL OF CHARTING THE NECESSARY LEGISLATIONS AND STRATEGIES TO ADDRESS THE PERSISTENT PROBLEM OF UNEMPLOYMENT IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2018-05-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01843
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE LATEST REPORT FROM THE PHILIPPINE STATISTICS AUTHORITY SHOWING THAT 145,000 MORE FILIPINOS ARE UNEMPLOYED IN 2017 WITH AN END GOAL OF CHARTING THE NECESSARY LEGISLATIONS AND STRATEGIES TO ADDRESS THE PERSISTENT PROBLEM OF UNEMPLOYMENT IN THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT ON 2018-05-30
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-05-21;
